course.subject: ISOM
course.name: IoT Management Strategy
course.description: This course will introduce the Internet of Things (IoT) technologies and services and how it accelerates the digital transformation in an organization. loT gives access to the data from billions of connected devices which will create new knowledge with recommended actions from analytics, business leaders can think and act differently, create new insights that foster innovation, disrupt current industry models and engage new markets. Other related areas will also be discussed, such as industry trends, opportunities, common issues in the adoption and directions in this fast growing area.
